Text.val: @This program creates a file with debtors which must be reported to the
This file is used to calculate the commission which must be paid
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files; SCR17533 Replaced FileSize()>0 checks by
10.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
04.05.2007 SH SCR12486 BDH410 Changed rough selection to calc sales for every
03.05.2007 SH SCR12486 BDH410B Changed update of V.LIMIT
01.05.2007 AK SCR12486 changes in the spec (see note in SCR)
01.05.2007 AK SCR12486 changed the sort order in SelectCLHS (see note in SCR)
01.05.2007 AK SCR12486 changed the updating of v.SUMDCMO (see note in SCR)
... uses same temp table to collect debtors to handle as used
... uses to strip CSV reversed charaters
... format input parameters to proper FL date pictures
... in case of input parameters are blank or contains invalid dates uses quater
-- Both dates must be in the same year, else error and stop program
-- In case of no errors go with further preparations
... calculate unique runnumber for the temp table to collect debtors to handle,
see BDH410A (uses same temp table as used in BDC151C)
... prepare CSV header only once, same for both reports
-- In case of reports already exist, stop program
-- Start with data selection for report
... first delete temp table which is used to collect debtors to handle before
-- BDH410C (only write debtor to file if something has to be paid)
... so only one debtor heller has to be stored to temp table
... else it's a legal group, so all related DEBH rows have to be selected
-- Store every debtor of the legal group to temp table
@For every month (V.MM) between date from and until we need to test
if there was a positive credit limit --> See EndTask condition
-- Cycle every month between PI.DATEFROM and PI.DATEUNTIL
-- Test if there was a positive limit in the selected month
-- Continue with calculations only if v.Limit > 0, else stop BDH401B, see
-- Calculate limirt over all debtors in temp table, see BDH410A
-- Calculate DCMO totals for every debtor in temp table, see BDH410A

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES - DCMO_TOTASALESCREDNOTES) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DCMO where DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC_DEBH = :4 and DCMO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':5' and DCMO_YEAR = :6 and DCMO_MONTH = :7 for fetch only
